channel.title: Karate at Home Guide on Kamaete: Karate at Home
channel.description: Recent content in Karate at Home Guide on Kamaete: Karate at Home

item.title: Black-brown belt / 1st Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Tobikomizuki/Nagashizuki/Gyakuzuki Basic 3: Otoshi barai & stand up technique Basic 4: Mawashi uraken

item.title: Brown-black belt / 2nd Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 3: Kette junzuki no-tsukommi Basic 4: Kette gyakuzuki no-tsukommi Basic 5: Tobi sokuto (Jumping sidekick) Basic 6: Tatsumaki geri (Tornado kick)

item.title: Brown belt / 3rd Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Kette junzuki Basic 2: Kette gyakuzuki Basic 3: Kette junzuki no-tsukommi Basic 4: Kette gyakuzuki no-tsukommi Basic 5: Gyaku mawashi geri (Hook kick)

item.title: Purple belt / 4th Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Kette junzuki Basic 2: Kette gyakuzuki Basic 3: Kette junzuki no-tsukommi Basic 4: Kette gyakuzuki no-tsukommi Basic 6: Ushiro mawashi geri (spinning hook kick) Solo combinations Solo Combination 1: Mae geri/Mawashi geri/Sokuto/Ushiro geri/Gyakuzuku Solo Combination 2: Mae geri/Tobikomizuki/Ashi barai/Tobikomizuki/Haito Solo Combination 3: Yoko geri/Mawashi geri/Mawashi uraken/Gyakazuki Pairs Pair 1 Attack Defence Pair 2 Attack Defence

item.title: Blue belt / 5th Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Kette junzuki Basic 2: Kette gyakuzuki Basic 3: Kette junzuki no-tsukommi Basic 4: Kette gyakuzuki no-tsukommi Basic 5: Nagashizuki Basic 6: Kakato geri Solo combinations Solo Combination 1: Mae geri/Gyakuzuki/Zenshin Shiite/Joden uke/Gyakuzuki Solo Combination 2: Mae geri/Yoko geri/Mawashi geri/Gyakuzuki Solo Combination 3: Mae geri/Mawashi geri/Sokuto/Ushiro geri/Gyakuzuki Pairs Pair 1: Attacker left/Defender right Pair 2: Drop sweep (Otoshi barai)

item.title: Green belt / 6th Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Kick/Punch (Kette junzuki) Sensei Mary Sensei Rob Basic 2: Front kick/Opposite punch (Kette gyakuzuki) Sensei Mary Sensei Rob Basic 3: Tobikomizuki from shizentai Basic 4: Sokuto Chudan Basic 5: Mawashi geri nikai Basic 6: Nidan geri Pairs Pair 1: Overview (Mawashi geri/Tobikomizuki/Gyakuzuki/Ashi Barai/Kizamizuki) Pair 1: Defence (Body shield/Chop block) Pair 2: Attack (I forgot to defend my head on the stunning elbow strike) Pair 2: Defence (Nagash-uke/Empi/Mawashi empi/Ashi barai/Tobikomizuki) Pair 2: Defence (Nagash-uke/Empi/Mawashi empi/Ashi barai/Tobikomizuki) Solo combinations Solo Combination 1: Tobikomizuki/Gyakuzuki/Ashi Barai/Gyakuzuki Solo Combination 2: Yoko geri/Mawashi geri/Gyakuzuki Solo Combination 3: Mawashi geri/Ushiro geri/uraken

item.title: Orange belt / 7th Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Junzuki no tsukkomi (leaning front punch) Basic 2: Gyakuzuki no tsukkomi (leaning opposite punch) Basic 3: Roundhouse kick (Mawashi geri - Chudan) Basic 4: Roundhouse kick (Mawashi geri) Basic 5: Back kick (Ushiro geri) Solo combinations Solo Combination 1: Mae geri/Mawashi geri/Gyakuzuki Solo Combination 2: Mae geri/Tobikomizuki/Zenshin koutai/Tobikomizuki/Mawashi geri Solo Combination 3: Back fist/chop (uraken/Shuto gamen) Pairs Pair 1 Pair 2

item.title: Yellow-orange belt / 8th Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Kette junzuki (Front kick and front punch) Basic 2: Kette gyakuzuki (Front kick and opposite punch) Basic 3: Roundhouse kick (Mawashi geri) Basic 4: Step up sidekick (surikomi sokuto) Pairs Inner block/Backfist/Gyakuzuki Solo combinations Solo Combination 1: Sidekick to the side/Front kick/Opposite punch (Yoko sokuto/Mae geri/Gyakuzuki) Solo Combination 2: Roundhouse kick/Opposite punch (Mawashi geri/Gyakuzuki) Solo Combination 3: Side kick/Back fist (Sokuto/Uraken)

item.title: Yellow belt / 9th Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Step and punch in zenkutsudachi Basic 2: Gyakuzuki from zenkutsudachi Basic 3: Front kick (Mae geri) Basic 4: Step up side kick (surikomi sokuto) Solo combinations Solo Combination 1: Elbow and back fist (Empi uraken) Solo Combination 2: Front kick/Opposite punch (Mae geri/Gyakuzuki) Solo Combination 3: Front kick/Jab punch (Mae geri/Tobikomizuki)

item.title: Red-black belt / 10th Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Step punch (Junzuki) in Zenkutsudachi Basic 2: Elbow strike (Empi) Basic 3: Step up front kick (Surikomi mae geri) Basic 4: Step up roundhouse kick (Surikomi mawashi geri) Blocking Blocking 1: Head block (Jodan uke) Blocking 2: Low block (Gedan barai) Blocking 3: Inner block (Uchi uke) Blocking 4: Cross block high and low (Juju uke jodan and gedan) Movement Movement: Step/Shuffle/Directional changes/Jab and Gyakuzuki

item.title: Red belt / 11th Kyu
item.description: Stances Attention stance/Musubudachi Ready stance/Yo-oi Forward leaning stance (Zenkutsudachi) Blocking Head block/low block/inner block Movement Step/shuffle/switch/turn

item.title: White belt / 12th Kyu
item.description: Stances Attention stance/Musubudachi Ready stance/Yo-oi Forward leaning stance (Zenkutsudachi) Punching Punching (blue stripe)

item.title: Forest Dojo
item.description: This is not a drill: Who are you anyway? Make yourself proud A little bit of something... New habits Do it once (then keep doing it once) You don't have to want to.

item.title: Kata tutorial and demonstration
item.description: Tutorial Kata support: half-turned cat stance Pinan yodan walkthrough Pinan godan walkthrough Demonstration Pinan nidan Pinan sandan Pinan shodan Pinan yodan Pinan godan Naifanchi Kushanku Gojushiho Nipaipo Superinpei Superinpei Shito Ryu Superinpei by Rika Usami Bassai dai

item.title: Kicks tutorial
item.description: Mae Geri/Front Kick Spinning Hook Kick Side kick (Yoko Geri) Exercise Improve your balance for kicking

item.title: Weapons tutorial
item.description: Nunchaku Elite Figure 8 Nunchaku Advanced Tutorial Bo Toma Bo Tokumine no kun

item.title: Exercises, challenges and badges
item.description: Exercises Daily stretch Karate home training exercises Challenges Sensei Billy's kata/chores Planking with Sensei Joe Sensei Billy's Plank Challenge Skipping Challenge Blocking Challenge Badges Skipping badge 1 Skipping badge 2
